MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G73 postcode area of Rutherglen, affecting properties in Hamilton Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.45pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.03pm on Wednesday 24 February 2021.
